name: Dicey Decisions (GMTK Game Jam 2022)
description:
Roll the Dice and make a path to the end! 

Each face of the dice is a different layout of platforms to help you reach the end. Be careful, some of the dice have more obstacles than others! If all else fails you can reroll the die to try and get a different layout. How many times must you roll the die to reach the end?

Use WASD to move the player and use the mouse to pick up tiles and click again to place them. Press R to return to the main menu.

Created for the Game Makers ToolKit 2022 Game Jam. Based on the theme "A Roll of the Dice".
